docs.snippet: Bartolo Colon allowed his first base runner with two outs in the seventh, and the Mets hung on to defeat the Mariners....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon allowed his first base runner with two outs in the seventh, and the Mets hung on to defeat the Mariners.
docs.abstract: New York Mets beat Seattle Mariners, 3-2, with Bartolo Colon pitching perfect game into the seventh inning.

headline.main: With Trade Deadline Looming, Mets’ Colon Is Untouchable Into the Seventh

docs.snippet: As rain lashed Yankee Stadium, the grounds crew struggled to get the tarp over the infield, and the game was called with one out in the bottom of the fifth....
docs.lead_paragraph: As rain lashed Yankee Stadium, the grounds crew struggled to get the tarp over the infield, and the game was called with one out in the bottom of the fifth.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees beat Texas Rangers, 2-1, in game that was called with one out in the bottom of the fifth due to rain.

headline.main: In Downpour, Delay by the Grounds Crew Helps the Yankees
headline.print_headline: In a Downpour, a Delay by the Grounds Crew Helps the Yanks

docs.snippet: When the bronze plaques of Greg Maddux and Tony La Russa are unveiled at the annual induction ceremonies at the Baseball Hall of Fame on Sunday in Cooperstown, their caps will have no logos....
docs.lead_paragraph: When the bronze plaques of Greg Maddux and Tony La Russa are unveiled at the annual induction ceremonies at the Baseball Hall of Fame on Sunday in Cooperstown, their caps will have no logos.
docs.abstract: Bronze plaques of baseball greats Greg Maddux and Tony La Russa will feature caps with no logos when they are unveiled at annual induction ceremonies at Baseball Hall of Fame; both men decided that they would not choose between the multiple teams they were part of, decision that has been made by other inductees in the past.

headline.seo: Greg Maddux and Tony La Russa Opt to Have No Logo on Their Hall of Fame Plaques
headline.main: At Hall, a Blank Look Is in Style
headline.print_headline: At Hall, a Blank Look Is in Style

docs.snippet: A major-league-high 22 players — including Prince Fielder, acquired in a blockbuster trade — have been on the Rangers’ disabled list....
docs.lead_paragraph: A major-league-high 22 players — including Prince Fielder, acquired in a blockbuster trade — have been on the Rangers’ disabled list.
docs.abstract: Texas Rangers are having abysmal season, especially in terms of injuries; disabled list has reached 22 players, a major league high; outcome is significant reversal from previous years in which team was normally considered a playoff contender.

headline.main: Rangers’ Numerous Injuries Shelve a Promising Season
headline.print_headline: Rangers’ Numerous Injuries Shelve a Promising Season
